summary:
More than 10 years’ experience in product management and business development in domains Logistics, (online) Payments, Fraud Prevention, Partnership Management in International (e-)Commerce. 

I've held a number of executive roles within a variety of International companies after I completed my Master’s Degree (Msc.) in Economics. 

As a Global Payments and Fraud Manager, I was based in San Jose, California, USA and Amsterdam, The Netherlands. I was responsible for the companies Payments and Fraud Strategy for all Payments (methods) via more than 15 acquirers, PSP's and Gateways in over 25 countries globally for 6 of our brands. 

In May 2016 I joined Afterpay (Arvato Finance B.V.) as their Sales & Partnership Director, where Payments, Fraud Prevention and FinTech come together. I strive to build long-term partnerships to enable Afterpay to become a highly accepted and sought after Payment method by Customers and Merchants globally. This made me a Buy Now Pay Later expert.

After 2 successful years at AfterPay I have decided to move to Perseuss to head the sales and business development team within the EMEA region. Together with our community our goal is to fight fraud and share our knowledge.

To broaden my work experience and gain deeper knowledge of product management I became head of product of UBsend. At UBsend we strive to become a world class shipping service provider for mainly European retail companies who want to ship their goods cross-border and offering additional value-added services like one single integration for carrier parcelshops, retrieving tracking events and case management tooling.

profile_positions.description:
Managing global (online) payment processing for all Travix global websites in 24 countries, 6 different brands and multiple devices.
Define and execute payment & fraud strategy for Travix
Contract negotiation with PSP's, acquirers (including cost reduction)
Set-up and maintaining reporting framework
Payment configuration management and set-up
Go-to-person for PCI DSS Compliancy for one of our payment platforms.
Working with multiple internal and external (payment) stakeholders to further enhance and / or rebuild the existing online payment and fraud platforms.
Heading for our online fraud prevention teams (> 12 team members) across the globe (Amsterdam, San Jose California and Bangalore) for all our websites from our Amsterdam office
Product Owner for a payments/ back-office scrum team in Amsterdam
